pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kumaraswamy Complementary Weibull Geometric (Kw-CWG) Probability Distribution // Density, distribution function, quantile function and random generation for the Kumaraswamy Complementary Weibull Geometric (Kw-CWG) lifetime probability distribution proposed in Afify, A.Z. et al (2017) doi:10.1214/16-BJPS322.
